alert.note: Alert for Interior Cumberland Highlands; Southern Franklin; Southern Oxford; Southern Somerset (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 22 at 11:07AM EST until November 22 at 3:00PM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation. Additional snow accumulations are expected to be elevation-dependent, up to two inches new snow for a storm total of 4 to 7 inches, sleet accumulations between one tenth and two tenths of an inch, and ice accumulations around a light glaze. * WHERE...Portions of south central and western Maine and central and northern New Hampshire. * WHEN...Until 3 PM EST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Even light snowfall amounts can accumulate on roads and cause dangerous driving conditions due to snow covered roads.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by going to newengland511.org
